oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Development of organic livestock production in Romania
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mihai, Prof. Gheorghe
Chis, Prof. Margareta
Odagiu, Ing. Antonia
Mihai, Econ. Valentin
Balint, Econ. Lenke
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Romania
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper is a sythesis regarding multiple aspects concerning the development and future prospects of organic livestock production in Romania. It focuses on livestock statistics, the legislation, the inspection and certification, the pre-accesion programmes and some subsidizing aspects.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Mihai, Prof. Gheorghe; Chis, Prof. Margareta; Odagiu, Ing. Antonia; Mihai, Econ. Valentin and Balint, Econ. Lenke (2006) Development of organic livestock production in Romania. Poster at: Joint Organic Congress, Odense, Denmark, May 30-31, 2006.
